oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Assessing Librarian Expectations Before and After LibGuides Implementation
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Anderson, Katie Elson
Springs, Gene R.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: research guides
instruction
reference
assessment
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This study evaluated librarian expectation and experience before and after the implementation of the LibGuides platform at an ARL member institution. Two surveys were distributed to librarians responsible for subject research guides, one to determine expectations before the introduction of LibGuides, and one to determine if and how those expectations were or were not met following adoption of the platform. Findings indicate that after implementation, LibGuides were updated more often and used more frequently for both instruction and reference than the previously used subject guides. This study can aid other libraries in planning similar implementations of LibGuides at their institutions.
oai_dc:dc.dc:publisher: Association for Information Science and Technology
